By Group "Super NLP"

In the previous blog, our team shows the progress we made in data mining and preprocessing. This blog we will guide you through our sentiment analysis toward XRP related tweets.

Financial Data

Before we can start the sentiment analysis, we found that part of the financial data of XRP we loaded from Yahoo Finance was missing. Specifically, the data on October 12, 2020 was missing in the Yahoo Finance database. So we chose Investing.com to get the whole year data of XRP and recalculated the return and 30 days volatility.

The code we use is as follows:
